mdRecord.dcterms:title: Studies in southern history and politics / inscribed to William Archibald Dunning, PH. D., LL. D., Lieber professor of history and political philosophy in Columbia university, by his former pupils, the authors
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original black cloth; front hinge split; backstrip repaired with black tape. With Edwin A. Alderman's bookplate on front pastedown.
